metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20459 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: In radare2 through 3.1.3, the armass_assemble function inlibr/asm/arch/arm/armass.c allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service(application crash by out-of-bounds read) by crafting an arm assembly inputbecause a loop uses an incorrect index in armass.c and certain lengthvalidation is missing in armass64.c, a related issue to CVE-2018-20457.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
